main event: On 23 July 1952, at approximately 2030 hours, an airman stationed at Moody Air Force Base reported the sighting of possibly five unusual flying objects that appeared to be white in color and traveled at extremely high speeds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about one hour and fifteen minutes,The first object was described as red, fading to dull white and then green before becoming stationary,One of the objects was observed remaining completely stationary, changing color from blue to red, at one point a white flash was seen between two of the objects, Confirmation from AACS Detachment stated around twelve aircraft were in the general area during the sighting.
location: Moody Air Force Base, Georgia, United States
witness description: SOURCE is a high school graduate and presently assigned as a flight clerk at the base.
